ValidationRule.description: Fill Out Reason Why Status Changed for Rescind,pushed, or canceled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Pushed"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Rescind") ), RecordType.Name <> 'Sapper_CSS', ISBLANK(Why__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Fill out "Reason Why Status Changed"
